Class WallFollowingEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy
      • WallFollowingEnemy

  • public class WallFollowingEnemy
extends Enemy
    This is a WallFollowingEnemy class which is used to create an enemy that will only follow walls on either its left or right.
    Creation Date: 22/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 2/12/19.
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Szymon Grzech (988065)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String direction 
      private static java.lang.String IMAGE_FOLDERNAME_SMART 
      private boolean started 
      private java.lang.String wallFollowed
      String wallFollowed states the wall followed by the enemy, either left or right String direction states one of the four different directions the enemy is walking in.

      • wallFollowed

        private java.lang.String wallFollowed

      • move

        public void move(Character ch,
                 Cell[][] map)
        Follows either the left or the right wall all around the map.
        Specified by:
        move in class Enemy
        Parameters:
        ch - the Character, used to get the characters coordinates and is used to kill the character if they are on the same coordinates.
        map - a 2D array of Cells on which the enemies move around.

      • left

        private void left(Cell[][] map)
        If left wall followed Those are hard coded scenarios for one of the four possible outcomes on each occasion on each direction followed. Does not pass through collectables.
        Parameters:
        map - of Cells

      • right

        private void right(Cell[][] map)
        If right wall followed Those are hard coded scenarios for one of the four possible outcomes on each occasion on each direction followed. Does not pass through collectables.
        Parameters:
        map - of Cells
